name: Strawberry Honey Greek Yogurt
description:
FLV Milk and Honey, FW Yogurt, and Yes we Cheesecake add up to a near perfect take on Zoi Honey Greek.

The fruits add a lovely sweet yet tart strawberry with hints of seeds.

Sweeten to taste.
author: Freshepies

reviews.text: 3 day steep Very tasty recipe. INW raspberry is very potent of might change it to one drop per 30ml, but for now it lends a nice tartness to the vape. Cant decide if i'm going to add it to the rotation, but for now it itches that yogurt spot. thanks for the recipe
brought this to work with me this week and it didn't disappoint. Although when i went to mix it the strange percentages threw me off a bit, but nonetheless it still tasted great. Thanks for sharing
